About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

My name is Rutvik Solanki and I am a full-stack Web Application Developer and Software Developer, currently living in Ahmedabad, Gujarat. I Am Studying Bachelor IT Engineering from Government Engineering College, Modasa and my primary focus and inspiration for my studies is Web Development. In my free time, I study Android and the IOs Development.

Language Known

Full Stack Developer

I have been studying web development since 2015 and I develop in both .net and PHP, though I primarily use .net. I am experienced in both front and back-end development, and I am proficient in HTML/HTML5, CSS/CSS3, SASS, XML, JavaScript, jQuery, AJAX, and SQL/MySQL to name a few.

Designer

Front End Developer

I am both driven and self-motivated, and I am constantly experimenting with new technologies and techniques. I am very passionate about Web Development, and strive to better myself as a developer, and the development community as a whole.

Webworks

Graphic Designer

The site you are currently viewing is completely original, and runs on the Xpress version of Sitecore CMS. The site also has a much older version written in PHP that uses a rough, custom-built MVC-like architecture. I will make both the .NET and PHP versions of the site available upon request.
